item.name: ERR_NOT_FOUND
item.solution:
Solution Advice:
1. Make sure you have setup enviornment by execute: $ source build/envsetup.sh
2. makeconfig must be executable, to check it: $ ls -l build/tools/makeconfig
you might make it executable by: $ chmod a+x build/tools/makeconfig

item.name: ERR_OTA_INCOMPATIBLE
item.detail: The ota.zip is a incompatible ota package.
item.solution: Check whether META-INF and system directory are in ota.zip

item.name: ERR_MISSION_FAILED
item.detail: Mission Failed, as catching a Runtime Error.
